```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ambient)
```


```{r}
distubance <- expand.grid(c = 1:25, r = 1:49) %>% 
  mutate(
    c = ifelse(r %%2 == 0, c + 0.5, c),
    a = 180 * gen_cubic(c, r, frequency = 0.1, seed = 1964)
  ) %>% 
  filter(c <= 25)

ggplot(distubance) +
  geom_text(aes(c, r, label = "O", angle = a, size = 5)) +
  coord_fixed(ratio = 0.5, 
              expand = T) +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

ggsave(here::here("figures", "riley_disturbance_1964.png"), dpi = 320, width = 6, height = 6)
``
